Posts.Content: Aug 3, 2009 01:43PM danny5280 wrote: Hi,  I had dbl mast, full hyst and reconstruction (expanders) all at the same time.  The hysterectomy was done thru an old c-section scar.  I too am really glad I did all the surgery at once.  It wasn't as bad as I anticipated.  The hyst part was worse than the mast - probably because it wasn't done lap.  I thought the hardest part of the recovery was being tired, the pain was for the most part well controlled.  You have a good day and then would tend to do more than what was recommended and then you would pay for it the next day!  The doctors know what they are talking about when they tell you to take it easy the first few weeks.  You will do great!
